data.oai_dc:dc: Daily measurements of soil GHG fluxes used to describe soil functional types in Petrakis et al. Fluxes are calculated as daily means and curated for QA/QC as described in the journal article. Measurement dates comprise from September 2014 to September 2015. Values as -9999 represent missing values due to QA/QC or instrument failure.
soil CO2 efflux|soil CH4 fluxes|soil N2O fluxes|automated measurements|soil respiration
